How to type French accents on a Mac

Mac OS

12 Feb 2020

In this post
  • Acute accent (é)
  • Grave accent (è)
  • Cedilla (ç)
  • OE Ligature (œ)
  • Tréma (ë, ï, ü)
  • Circumflex (â, ê, î, ô, û)
  • Euro (€)

Acute accent (é)

  • Press Option and e, then e.
  • This works for a and o as well.

Grave accent (è)

  • Press Option and \`, then e.
  • This works for a, o and u as well.

Cedilla (ç)

  • Press Option and c.

OE Ligature (œ)

  • Press Option and q.

Tréma (ë, ï, ü)

  • Press Option and u, then e, i or u.

Circumflex (â, ê, î, ô, û)

  • Press Option and i, then a, e, i, o or u.

Euro (€)

  • Press Option, Shift and 2.
admin mac os
